content: import { 	Card, 	CardContent, 	CardDescription, 	CardFooter, 	CardHeader, 	CardTitle, } from "@/components/ui/card"; import Link from "next/link";  const CCard: React.FC<{ fileName: string }> = ({ fileName }) => { 	const fileNameWithoutExt = fileName.substring(0, fileName.indexOf(".")); 	return ( 		<Link href={`/${fileNameWithoutExt}`}> 			<Card> 				<CardHeader> 					<CardTitle>{fileNameWithoutExt}</CardTitle> 				</CardHeader> 			</Card> 		</Link> 	); };  export default CCard;
